card_text: When you activate this card: You can reveal 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" in your hand; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster you control; return that face-up monster to the hand, then you can apply the following effect, based on the original name of the card returned to the hand.$N●"Blue-Eyes White Dragon": Special Summon 1 monster from your hand.$N●Other: Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes" monster from your hand.$NYou can only activate 1 "Vision with Eyes of Blue" per turn.
